descriptionMdByRank.1: When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by **20%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by **31%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by **42%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by **53%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by **64%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
